Class ReflectionUtil.RefClass

java.lang.Object
de.framedev.essentialsmini.managers.ReflectionUtil.RefClass
Enclosing class:
ReflectionUtil
public static class ReflectionUtil.RefClass
extends java.lang.Object
RefClass - utility to simplify work with reflections.
